mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , TO_CHAR(LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_IP , TO_CHAR(LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LATEST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
